review: I bought this device for Netflix streaming and access to Amazon Prime content.  My blu-ray player was being used for streaming, but it had intermittent wifi connection problems.  And my internet speed is fast.  With the Fire TV, no more wifi connection issues.  The beefed up hardware in the box clearly makes a difference in performance.  I also like that it has an optical out port to send audio to my receiver.
